articles.title: 'Alarming rise' in measles cases in Europe as 'national incident' declared in UK - Euronews
articles.description: With a “national incident” over measles in the UK, what’s the situation in Europe?
articles.content:
Europe is experiencing an alarming rise in measles cases, the World Health Organization (WHO) warned on Tuesday, with a more than 30-fold rise across the region in 2023.
More than 30,000 measles cas… [+4062 chars]
